verbs.description: The bill [V: would] authorize TennCare to seek a waiver under President Donald Trump 's administration , which is allowing state Medicaid work requirements .
[ARG0: The bill] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: authorize] [ARG1: TennCare to seek a waiver under President Donald Trump 's administration , which is allowing state Medicaid work requirements] .
The bill would authorize [ARG0: TennCare] to [V: seek] [ARG1: a waiver] [ARGM-LOC: under President Donald Trump 's administration , which is allowing state Medicaid work requirements] .
The bill would authorize TennCare to seek a waiver under President Donald Trump 's administration , which [V: is] allowing state Medicaid work requirements .
The bill would authorize TennCare to seek a waiver under [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's administration] , [R-ARG0: which] is [V: allowing] [ARG1: state Medicaid work requirements] .
